LanguageData.SurgeryOutcomeBase.outcomes.1.letterText: {SURGEON_labelShort} ha cometido un error fatal mientras operaba a {PATIENT_labelShort} debido a la complejidad de: {RECIPE_etiqueta}.
LanguageData.SurgeryOutcomeBase.outcomes.2.letterText: {SURGEON_labelShort} ha fallado catastróficamente mientras operaba a {PATIENT_labelShort} ({RECIPE_label}).
LanguageData.SurgeryOutcomeBase.outcomes.3.letterText: {SURGEON_labelShort} ha fallado de forma ridícula mientras operaba a {PATIENT_labelShort} ({RECIPE_label}).
LanguageData.SurgeryOutcomeBase.outcomes.4.letterText: {SURGEON_labelShort} ha fallado mientras operaba a {PATIENT_labelShort} ({RECIPE_label}), dejando a {PATIENT_objective} estéril.
LanguageData.SurgeryOutcomeBase.outcomes.5.letterText: {SURGEON_labelShort} ha fallado mientras operaba a {PATIENT_labelShort} ({RECIPE_label}), dejando a {PATIENT_objective} estéril.
LanguageData.SurgeryOutcomeBase.outcomes.6.letterText: {SURGEON_labelShort} ha fallado de forma leve mientras operaba a {PATIENT_labelShort} ({RECIPE_label}).
LanguageData.SurgeryOutcomeMinorFailure.outcomes.1.le: {SURGEON_labelShort} ha fallado de forma leve mientras operaba a {PATIENT_labelShort} ({RECIPE_label}).
